basic.blooming: Flowering and fruiting period in summer
basic.color: Flower color yellow, fruit color yellow, white, green, mixed with color stripes

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, high quality fruits in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
